Articles.Content:
I take the hill over because I owned the other hill that was part of the collision.

my hill.

(definitely unrealistic battles. Battle of Yavin could have been over without a trench run, just come in from directly above the exaust port.)

**Edited <time datetime="2017-04-02T17:03:40Z" title="04/02/2017 05:03  PM" data-short="7 yr">April 2, 2017</time> by 53miner53**

I Bomb the Defences on the hill with 5 TU-95 (with 1.5ton guided bombs) and parachute a bunker on the hill.  

My hill

Wrong hill.

But yours.

I push the bunker off the hill with a bulldozer.

My hill
Why those two are fighting for a wrong hill, a family of gophers occupy the correct hill.

...easy enough. I take my bulldozer, plow through the gopher nest (killing them in the process), flatten that hill and return to:

My Hill!

I sign a peace deal with the surviving gophers. 

My pact

I return from orbit in a space shuttle and make an emergency landing on the hill. 

My hill now.

One leg of your lander falls into a survived gophers' hole.

Survived gophers' hill and space shuttle.

I  send  groundhogs  to  make  friends  with  the  gophers.

Our  hill.

I call for ***murican*** air support. 

And carpet bomb the living sh\*t out of the hills. 

Apparently Abram's tanks are to fat drive through the mud and craters after  murican carpet bombing.  so I fail to occupy.

No one's hill.

**Edited <time datetime="2017-04-04T07:48:36Z" title="04/04/2017 07:48  AM" data-short="7 yr">April 4, 2017</time> by Skyer**
Colonize the hill and make some seriously strong bunker defending all incoming attacks under the hill.

The gophers get awaken by the carpet bombing and tanks roaring, crawl out from their deepest hole and eat the wires and cables under the bunker, 

Gophers' craterized hill protected with concrete slabs and metal scraps.

**Edited <time datetime="2017-04-04T11:32:27Z" title="04/04/2017 11:32  AM" data-short="7 yr">April 4, 2017</time> by kerbiloid**

>

> 
> 
> The gophers get awaken by the carpet bombing and tanks roaring, crawl out from their deepest hole and eat the wires and cables under the bunker, 
> 
> 
> 
> 
> Gophers' craterized hill protected with concrete slabs and metal scraps.
> 

Destroy the gophers once for all, then repair the hill base. Everything reverts to normal, and nobody noticed any sign of life below.

A hill.

note: some gophers survived. They're like cockroaches, you know?

**Edited <time datetime="2017-04-04T13:52:27Z" title="04/04/2017 01:52  PM" data-short="7 yr">April 4, 2017</time> by Hypercosmic**

Gophers stay undestroyed.

The hill.

> 
>

> 
> 
> Gophers stay undestroyed.
> 
> 
> 
> 
> The hill.
> 

Pardon me.

Spoiler

**WOULD YOU STOP BEING SO DAMN IGNORANT??? YOU RUINED MY JOKE IN ANOTHER THREAD, AND NOW THESE GOPHERS - AS TOUGH AS FING COCKROACHES**

Incoming!

![Q4aIGK3.jpg](http://i.imgur.com/Q4aIGK3.jpg)

With air support (Su-25's and Su-34's) and half Speznas army!

The Russian army rolls over the hill and establishes a FOB!

My hill!

**Edited <time datetime="2017-04-04T14:23:46Z" title="04/04/2017 02:23  PM" data-short="7 yr">April 4, 2017</time> by Skyer**

> 
>

> 
>

>

> 
>

> My hill!
> 

\*silently watches you taking over the hill, and you didn't noticed it.\*

Your hill.

I replace your FOB with a fob and attach it to my keyring--the very same which holds the keys to the hill.

My hill.

Supporting Hypercosmic with PL-01 Stealth Tanks, F-22's, F-35's of all sorts, Su-35's, M1A3 Abrams MBT's, M270 MLRS's, M777 Howitzers, M109 SPG's, B-52H's, B-2's, B-1B's, B-1R's, F/A-18E's, F-15E's, USS Ford with Laser, and Boeing 737 with Laser.

Our hill.

**Edited <time datetime="2017-04-04T15:23:20Z" title="04/04/2017 03:23  PM" data-short="7 yr">April 4, 2017</time> by Joseph Kerman**
  
No Commies!

When did y'all's planet turn into a war zone?

My peaceful planet

Your peaceful planet.

Meanwhile a green beautiful mantis climbs over a nice pink flower and meets a splendid butterfly trembling with her azure wings.

Spoiler

AND TEARS IT APARTS TO GORGE!!11oneone...

Their peaceful beautiful planet.

>

> My peaceful planet

Went pass, say hi, give them space tech and stuffs, and leave.

You peaceful planet Naal.

I will do a night surprise attack on the hill and... W.T.F.??? LEARN TO DRIVE NOOBS

![Super_ejercito_espanol.jpg](https://3.bp.blogspot.com/-gQPvNbV8mY8/UG1nlTMtSSI/AAAAAAAAD6g/17jdrZ55z0Q/s1600/Super_ejercito_espanol.jpg)

They do the attackers got spotted, missed the surprise factor I lose the combat

Your Hill.         T\_T

Turnbull Governments' hill.
